original_text: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued the king and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho, and all his army was scattered from him.
korean_text: 갈대아 군대가 그 왕을 뒤쫓아 가서 여리고 평지에서 시드기야를 따라 잡으매 왕의 모든 군대가 그를 떠나 흩어진지라

sentences.original_text: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued the king
and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho
and all his army was scattered from him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 모든 군대는 그에게서 흩어졌습니다
